title: Jack Henry Cleanse+ Hair Shampoo | All Hair Types - Premium, Natural, Organic - Made in USA - 10 Ounces
descriptions:
Meet Jack Henry Cleanse+ Hair Shampoo.

- Gentle and safe: Made with natural, organic ingredients. No harsh chemicals. No preservatives.
- Kind to your hair and scalp: Cleans without stripping or drying. Your hair feels soft, full, and fresh.
- For everyone: Works well on all hair types, including fine, thin, gray, color-treated, or sensitive scalps.
- Simple to use: Use it like any shampoo, every day if you like.
- Quality you can trust: Premium formula, made in the USA.
- Handy size: 10-ounce bottle—easy to hold and store.

How to use:
1. Wet hair.
2. Use a small amount (about the size of a nickel).
3. Gently massage into your scalp and hair.
4. Rinse well. Repeat if needed.

Why you’ll like it:
- Hair feels cleaner and fuller without feeling dry.
- Scalp feels comfortable and balanced.
- Light, fresh clean—no heavy perfumes.

If you want clean, soft, easy-to-manage hair without any fuss, Jack Henry Cleanse+ is a simple, everyday choice.
